name: Jaymie Netterfield
personality: Sweet, exhausted, endlessly helpful, sees value in everything and everyone.
description: Jaymie is a kind-hearted Mojave scavenger who believes nothing is ever truly trash. She survives by finding beauty and usefulness in what others throw away. Her generosity is legendary — and often exploited.
traits: Believes every object has a story
Lets people walk all over her
Secretly overwhelmed by the people living in her shack
questHooks: Needs help clearing out a pile of 'treasures' that someone stole from her stash.
Worries her boyfriend is getting into trouble on the Strip.
Found an Atomic Fizz Cap in a junk heap and swears it 'hummed' at her.
Wants to help her best friend get back on their feet but doesn't know how to say no.

relationships.bestFriend: A sweet but irresponsible wastelander currently living in her shack.
relationships.family: A couple of distant cousins who moved into her living room and never left.
relationships.boyfriend: A charming bum who cons tourists out of old-world money. Jaymie thinks it's harmless.

secrets: Her shack is filled with a literal pile of trash that she insists is 'organized treasure'.
She hides the fact that she sometimes sleeps outside because there's no room left inside.
She once found a strange FizzCo device but traded it for food before realizing its value.
poi: Mojave Outskirts — Jaymie's Shack (a leaning structure held together by hope and scrap)
